headline.main: President Discloses An Ailment of Colon; JOHNSON REVEALS A COLON AILMENT

byline.original: By NEIL SHEEHANSpecial to The New York Times

docs.abstract: goes to hosp to complete tests; illus leaving hosp with Mrs Johnson; has lunch with Chmn Okun at ranch
docs.lead_paragraph: AUSTIN, Tex., Aug. 8 -- President Johnson has had since 1960 a common intestinal condition known as diverticulosis, White House officials said today.
docs.snippet: AUSTIN, Tex., Aug. 8 -- President Johnson has had since 1960 a common intestinal condition known as diverticulosis, White House officials said today.
